Producer: Lloyd A. Silverman, Barbet Schroeder, Susan Hoffman
Synopsis: After assassinating a man in a Seattle café, Jessie (Anne Parillaud) awakes in a different life, on a plane bound for Jamaica with her new husband, Brian (William Baldwin). Jessie has recently been raped, and Brian treats her with extreme delicacy. Falling asleep, awakes back in Seattle as a hit woman contracted to kill Brian, who -- in this reality -- is a handsome stranger. As she switches between the two identities, Jessie is unable to tell which life is really hers.
Title: Shattered Image
